content.question: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. The cell cycle is fundamental to the reproduction of eukaryotic cells. (a) Describe the phases of the cell cycle.

frqParts.text: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. The cell cycle is fundamental to the reproduction of eukaryotic cells. (a) Describe the phases of the cell cycle.
(b) Explain the role of THREE of the following in mitosis or cytokinesis. Kinetochores Microtubules Motor proteins Actin filaments
(c) Describe how the cell cycle is regulated and discuss ONE consequence of abnormal regulation.
